about.title: About
about.heroDesc: A comprehensive management platform for academic conferences, supporting submission, review, and proceedings publication processes.
about.missionText: Our mission is to promote the dissemination of scientific knowledge through a transparent, efficient, and robust management system. We are committed to supporting researchers, reviewers, and organizers in every stage of the conference cycle.
about.addressText: 70 To Ky Street, Trung My Tay Ward, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City

reviewProcess.title: Review Process
reviewProcess.heroDesc: We ensure the highest research quality through a rigorous double-blind peer review system.
reviewProcess.step1Desc: Authors submit full papers through the portal. Submissions must comply with conference formatting guidelines.
reviewProcess.step2Desc: The Program Committee performs an initial check for scope, formatting, and plagiarism.
reviewProcess.step3Desc: Each paper is assigned to at least 3 reviewers following a double-blind peer review process.
reviewProcess.step4Desc: Based on reviewer recommendations, the Conference Chair makes the final decision (Accept, Revise, or Reject).
reviewProcess.step5Desc: Authors of accepted papers submit the camera-ready version after addressing reviewer comments.

authorGuide.title: Author Guide
authorGuide.heroDesc: Everything you need to know about preparing and submitting your manuscript. We provide formatting templates, submission checklists, and key policies to ensure a smooth publication process.
authorGuide.formattingList1: Use the official IEEE template for all submissions.
authorGuide.formattingList2: Papers must not exceed 6 pages (including references).
authorGuide.formattingList3: All figures and tables must be clear and captioned.
authorGuide.formattingList5: Do not include author information in the initial manuscript (for blind review).
authorGuide.checklist1: The paper has not been published previously.
authorGuide.checklist2: All co-authors have approved the submission.
authorGuide.checklist3: The paper complies with formatting guidelines.
authorGuide.policyText1: All submissions will be checked for plagiarism using specialized software. Any paper with high similarity without proper citation will be rejected immediately.
authorGuide.policyText2: Authors must adhere to strict ethical standards in research. Data fabrication or other misconduct will result in a ban on future submissions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: We collect personal information when you register, submit a paper, or participate in conference activities. This includes your name, email, affiliation, and other relevant details.
privacy.section2Text: Your information is used to manage the submission, review, and conference organization processes. We may also use it to contact you regarding important updates.
privacy.section3Text: We are committed to protecting your data and implement appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or modification of personal information.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact the conference organizers.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.section1Text: By accessing and using the UTH Conference Portal, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms.section2Text: You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide and the content you submit. You agree not to engage in any activity that harms the system or the reputation of the conference.
terms.section3Text: All content on this portal, including text, images, and software, is the intellectual property of the University of Transport HCMC or its licensors.
terms.contactText: Any questions regarding these terms of use should be sent to the organizers' email address.
